links.title: How to Become A Millionare Roth IRA
links.description: Becoming a millionaire isn't rocket science. By investing $5,500 into your Roth ira annually you will have over a million dollars cash tax free by the time you retire. Roth ira's aren't complicated-YOU choose which investments you want to make into your roth ira and if you ever are cash strapped you can pull your cash out at any moment penalty free!

links.title: Volatility index manipulation contributed to the market plunge last week, whistleblower alleges in interview
links.description: Through his attorney, an alleged whistleblower has written a letter to the SEC alleging the CBOE Volatility Index, a key measure of market fear, is subject to potential manipulation, and that it could be causing nearly $2 billion in annual gains and losses to investors.

Apple CEO: We can make a 'significant contribution' in health care https://www.cnbc.com/2018/02/13/apple-ceo-tim-cook-can-make-significant-contribution-in-health-care.html

links.title: Apple CEO: We can make a 'significant contribution' in health care
links.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook talked up the company's ambitions in the health-care sector on Tuesday, hinting that it will move beyond wellness apps and devices, like its step-tracking Apple Watch. Cook acknowledged at the company's annual shareholders meeting in Cupertino, California, that the health-care sector, which is notoriously complex, doesn't always encourage new players to innovate.

links.title: VIX, a gauge of volatility, is being manipulated, claims whistleblower in letter to SEC
links.description: CLOSE The VIX, a Wall Street "fear gauge" that measures volatility and was a big factor in wild stock price swings last week, is the target of a "manipulation scheme" that poses a risk to the stock market, an anonymous whistleblower told U.S. regulators.
